chunk:
Naked & Thriving Purify Charcoal Cleansing Bar

Brand: Naked & Thriving

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Sodium Rapeseedate, Sodium Cocoate, Water, Glycerin, Charcoal Powder, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Sodium Citrate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil*
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
